variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. Deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: NDB1A
variable.description: B1a. Information on transfer to inactive status. Judgment of Principal Investigator and Study Coordinator that participation in the study could not longer be considered informed or would be directly injurious to the patient's well-being
variable.value: Judgment of Principal Investigator and Study Coordinator that participation in the study could not longer be considered informed or would be directly injurious to the patient's well-being

variable.name: NDB1B
variable.description: B1b. Information on transfer to inactive status. Catastrophic injury or illness leading to coma, dementia, blindness, or inability to participate in EDIC testing procedures
variable.value: Catastrophic injury or illness leading to coma, dementia, blindness, or inability to participate in EDIC testing procedures

variable.name: NDB1C
variable.description: B1c. Information on transfer to inactive status. Inaccessibility to monitoring of outcomes (long term imprisonment)
variable.value: Inaccessibility to monitoring of outcomes (long term imprisonment)

variable.name: NDB1D
variable.description: B1d. Information on transfer to inactive status. Patient has withdrawn consent for continued participation

variable.name: NDB1E
variable.description: B1e. Information on transfer to inactive status. Information on transfer to inactive status: other

variable.name: NDB3A
variable.description: B3a. Information on transfer to inactive status. On what date would the proposed transfer to inactive status become effective? If uncertain, check here

variable.name: NDC1
variable.description: C1. Plans for future contact. Attempt to contact patient

variable.name: NDC2
variable.description: C2. Plans for future contact. Deidentified willing to return to clinic

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Deidentified date form completed

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. Deidentified patient ID
